dcterms:creator: Mohammad Taher Pilehvar
Dimitri Kartsaklis
Victor Prokhorov
Nigel Collier
dcterms:description: Card-660 is a word-word similarity task with 660 example pairs involving uncommon words and provides a benchmark for rare word representation models. It has a high inter-annotator agreement measure of 0.90 and contains examples from various domains such as technology, popular culture, and medicine.
dcterms:title: Card-660

dcterms:creator: Thang Luong
Richard Socher
Christopher Manning
dcterms:description: The Stanford Rare Word (RW) Similarity Benchmark is a word-word semantic similarity task including 2034 word pairs that tests the ability of representation learning methods to capture the semantics of infrequent words. It has a relatively low inter-annotator agreement measure of 0.41.
dcterms:title: Stanford Rare Word (RW) Similarity
